name: BUG BOY
description:
YOU ARE A BOY AND YOU LOVE BUGS

WASD TO MOVE

MOUSE TO ROTATE

SPACEBAR TO SWING THE NET

CATCH LOTS OF BUGS

"the spirit of the gameboy lives on, GAME=BUG" - phlegm.press

Made using the Survival Shooter Unity tutorial, with the assistance of many of my beautiful classmates at RMIT Game Design <3
